description: The Department of National Defence has a need to acquire chainsaws to use in support of other government departments in responding to natural disasters within Atlantic Canada.

full_summary:
**W0501-24M046 - Chainsaws**

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4540461904
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4540461904
* **Publication Date**: 2024-04-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-05-17T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-05-20
* **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined

### Procurement Description
The Department of National Defence is requesting proposals for the acquisition of chainsaws. The equipment will be used to support other government departments in responding to natural disasters within Atlantic Canada.

### Contracting Entity Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact Information
* **Name**: Matthew Furlong (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone**: Not available

### Notice of Tender
The Request for Proposal (RFP) is available on the Ariba Platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19516350](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19516350).

### Tender Terms and Conditions
The tender is open to all qualified suppliers. The bid evaluation will be based on the lowest price method.

### Trade Agreements
The contract will be issued in accordance with the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
